S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-244: with linux, depending on env setting $LANG and console encoding, some i18n tests fail
* Run the i18n tests run with -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 and -Dconsole.encoding=UTF-8 * Use UTF-8 encoding in ProcessStreamResult for the i18n tests * Make Sed.java read result files from i18n tests using UTF-8 encoding * Respect the derby.ui.codeset setting in i18n tests, and use UTF-8 if it is not specified.
